comment: Happy weekend ! Time for q4 . Be sure to write q4 and in your response so we can all learn with you . <URL>

comment: I m not sure that I do , but in working with I am learning to give students provocations instead of directions , and to give them time to play . Giving open-ended questions also encourages them tone creative rather than looking for a quick answer . Q4
